column6: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! "FOURTITUDE" PART 1 (OF 3) The FF goes "widescreen" in a tale of epic scope and proportion as Manhattan is cut off from the rest of the world by a fleet of miles-high alien spacecraft--and that's just the beginning!  With the Avengers in disarray, New York reluctantly turns to the disenfranchised Fantastic Four, the only heroes in town, to save them--but where to even start?
column8: | inker:Karl Kesel | writer:Mark Waid | penciller:Mike Wieringo
